reviewText: Michael D. Cohen is a comedic genius.

"t Was You Charlie" had all the components that make a film a total success - great story-line, super cast including Michael Cohen and Emma Fleury et al
great acting performances, various locations in Toronto and Scarborough Canada, costumes (especially the yellow beret) and intrigue. Great entertainment,
somewhat dark in places but beautifully directed and sequenced. Don't miss this all but classic film.. You will love it!
